alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Charles; St. Louis; St. Louis City (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued July 06 at 2:44PM CDT until July 07 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with heat index values up to 108. * WHERE...In Missouri, Jefferson MO, Saint Charles MO, Saint Louis City MO and Saint Louis MO Counties. In Illinois, Madison IL, Monroe IL and Saint Clair Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 PM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Heat related illnesses increase significantly during extreme heat and high humidity events.
info.instruction: People in the Saint Louis Metropolitan Area can get information about cooling centers or energy assistance related to the excessive heat by calling the United Way of Greater Saint Louis at 800-427-4626, or if calling from a land line phone dial 2-1-1. You can also call Cool Down Saint Louis at 314-241-7668.

area.areaDesc: Jefferson; St. Charles; St. Louis; St. Louis City
